name: The Queen’s Chain
description:
The Queen’s Chain is a brief narrative game that takes place in a forest in New Zealand in the mid-19th century. 

The land feels fresh and new, open to endless possibility... but first it has to be charted, measured, mapped, and made legible to the British Empire. That's where you step in. 

Cast in the middle of nowhere, your task it turn it into somewhere.  

(this is a game with 👻political👻 intentions. please check the devlog if you want to find out more.)

Credits

  • MrPixel font by Christophe Badani https://velvetyne.fr/fonts/mr-pixel/
  • Forest field recording by Grant Finley / Nature Sounds of NZ https://soundcloud.com/naturesounds_nz/manginangina-kauri-walk
